plot: When Jamie and Mimi get together for a harmless game of truth or drink, they have no idea what secrets and desires are about to be exposed.
title: Truth or Drink
plot_es: When Jamie and Mimi get together for a harmless game of truth or drink, they have no idea what secrets and desires are about to be exposed.
plot_en: When Jamie and Mimi get together for a harmless game of truth or drink, they have no idea what secrets and desires are about to be exposed.
